a.dialog: You know, I regret saying I hope we never see each other again.
It's much more fun to encrypt your files right in front of you.
Watching you helplessly struggle about while I do my job makes it more entertaining!
And I've done it to all of your cat files, too!
All your cats belong to me.
Don't worry though, I'm not awful awful.
You can get them all back for a little kaching.
You know, dollars! Currency! The blood money that rules your world.
We can talk price later, though. Still have other files to get to.
See you chump! Don't bother trying to do anything with your cat files; they're long gone.
